import "./index.css"; import { Card, Image, Icon } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; function DisplayedCard({ imgs, title, date, time, description, id, cb, history, technologies, animation, }) { return (
cb(false)} >

{title}

{history}

{imgs.map((image) => ( ))}
Did it in: {date} Technologies: {technologies.join(" ").toString()} {description}

Time to build this app: {time}hrs

); } export default DisplayedCard;
